name: Reconsider
storyline: A girl named Ellie Schmitt finds out she has magical powers. Powers with which she can change the thoughts of the people around her. After this discovery, she lives her life smoothly and comfortably until she needed to find a job. Since she only used her power to live her life, she had no qualifications for any position, whatsoever. So, she became a government employee and started delivering special packages to places the government wanted her to deliver. But everywhere she delivers sinks into chaos as soon as she delivers. What a coincidence?
summary: Reconsider is a cute point-and-click puzzle game.
